summary: Managing federal real property and disposing of it when it isn't needed is a longstanding challenge that has been on our High Risk List since 2003. A 2016 law set up a process that tests ideas for speeding up sales of unneeded properties and covering sale costs. The law set expectations for 3 "rounds" of identifying and selling federal properties, and established a dedicated fund...
title: Federal Real Property: Several Factors May Limit Efforts to Reduce Space under New Sale and Transfer Process
